channel.title: Heyburn|Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Heyburn|Minidoka County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at BL-84/ID-24/US-30 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 west to Rupert; left for US-30/BL-84 West to Burley and Heyburn.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84
item.description: I-84 East - Exit 211 Offramp at US-30/ID-24/BL-84 in Heyburn. Turn right for ID-24 West; left for US-30/BL-84 West.

item.title: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30
item.description: End ID-24 East at I-84/US-30 in Heyburn.

item.title: ID-27 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-27 north. Distance to Paul.

item.title: End BL-84 East at ID-24/I-84
item.description: End BL-84 (Burley and Heyburn) at I-84 west and ID-24. Use I-84 west for Twin Falls and Boise. Use ID-24 for Rupert and Minidoka.

item.title: BL-84/US-30 East Approaching I-84/ID-24
item.description: BL-84/US-30 east approaching I-84 and ID-24. US-30 turns east onto I-84 and the road continues as ID-24 towards Rupert.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 211
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 211 - US-30/ID-24/Rupert/Heyburn. This is one of the few overheads on Idaho highways outside of the metro. areas.
